aws::graph::propositions: # Meteorological Information and Flight Plan for Accident
Conditions at the accident site were Visual Meteorological Conditions (VMC).
The condition of light at the accident site was day.
The observation facility was KMFR at an elevation of 1,329 feet mean sea level.
The observation facility was 13 nautical miles from the accident site.
The observation time was 00:53 local time.
The observation facility was 42 degrees from the accident site.
The lowest cloud condition was scattered clouds at 5,000 feet above ground level.
The visibility at the accident site was 10 miles.
No lowest ceiling was reported.
No runway visual range (RVR) was reported.
The wind speed was 4 knots.
No wind gusts were reported.
No turbulence type was forecasted or observed.
The wind direction was 330 degrees.
No turbulence severity was forecasted or observed.
The altimeter setting was 30.22 inches of mercury.
The temperature was 13 degrees Celsius.
The dew point was 3 degrees Celsius.
There was no obscuration at the accident site.
There was no precipitation at the accident site.
The departure point was Grants Pass, Oregon.
The flight plan filed was an Instrument Flight Rules (IFR) plan.
The destination was Long Beach, California.
The type of clearance was Instrument Flight Rules (IFR).
The departure time was 14:20 local time.
No specific type of airspace was indicated.

text:
# Meteorological Information and Flight Plan

Conditions at Accident Site: Visual (VMC)
Condition of Light: Day

Observation Facility, Elevation: KMFR,1329 ft msl
Distance from Accident Site: 13 Nautical Miles

Observation Time: 00:53 Local
Direction from Accident Site: 42

Lowest Cloud Condition: Scattered / 5000 ft AGL
Visibility 10 miles

Lowest Ceiling: 
Visibility (RVR):

Wind Speed/Gusts: 4 knots /
Turbulence Type Forecast/Actual: / 

Wind Direction: 330
Turbulence Severity Forecast/Actual: / 

Altimeter Setting: 30.22 inches Hg
Temperature/Dew Point: 13C / 3C

Precipitation and Obscuration: No Obscuration; No Precipitation

Departure Point: Grants Pass, OR
Type of Flight Plan Filed: IFR

Destination: Long Beach, CA
Type of Clearance: IFR

Departure Time: 14:20 Local
Type of Airspace:
